Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Riverdell Way, running north and south, west of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The massive City Walls on the east side of the road, provide the ultimate in personal security for the entire town. Ever since they were built, no attack against the city has ever been successful. The people and military pray that any attack in the future will also fail.
